operations.content:
- event: route_stabilization
  description: Stabilize route http://localhost:8000/index.php?search=%D8%A7%D9%82%D8%AA%D8%B1%D8%A7%D8%AD%D8%A7%D8%AA
  actions:
    - action: add_event_handler
      handler: handle_route_stabilization
      conditions:
        - condition: route_visited
          route: http://localhost:8000/index.php?search=%D8%A7%D9%82%D8%AA%D8%B1%D8%A7%D8%AD%D8%A7%D8%AA
